description:
Evan has been wanting to do a film by himself for some time now. Mitch was back in town so I thought it would be a good opportunity for Evan to give it a try.
It's Evan's first solo project so it's not without a hiccup or two. But I thought he did really well for his first time out and I really liked the things he got Mitch to do. Mitch tries to suck his own cock, then fucks himself with a butt plug, then cums all over his chest, and then eats his own cum.
Oh, and just between you and me, I think Mitch has a thing for Evan. Hmmm....
title: Mitch 2
